titles.title: Veteran Employment and Child Care Access Act of 2018

To amend title 38, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide child care assistance to veterans receiving certain training or vocational rehabilitation, and for other purposes.
Veteran Employment and Child Care Access Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Veteran Employment and Child Care Access Act of 2018
This bill directs the Department of Veterans Affairs to provide child care assistance to veterans: (1) who are receiving certain training or vocational rehabilitation, (2) who are the primary caretaker of a child or children, and (3) whose family's adjusted gross income does not exceed certain limits.
